name: A frostburned cold metal ring
data: It decreases the users strength pitifully.
It decreases the users dexterity pitifully.
It increases the users constitution nicely.
It increases the users wisdom strongly.
It has awesome armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration somewhat.
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration nicely.
This item loses its magical powers very slowly.
It increases the users cold resistance strongly.
The wearer becomes more attuned to the elemental forces.
